question: Sulkhan Singh was appointed as the DGP of
explanation: Sulkhan Singh was appointed as the new director general of police, replacing Javeed Ahmed who has been posted as DG, PAC by the Yogi Adityanath-led state government. Sulkhan Singh, the 1980 batch IPS officer, would be heading the police department of Uttar Pradesh. He was currently posted in the Training Department of UP police.
